verses.verse: Now the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> more <S%H6175>subtle<s%> than <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>made.<s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H637>Yea,<s%> <S%H3588><s%> hath <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H4480>every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden?<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> We may <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H4480>fruit<s%> <S%H6529><s%> of the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the garden: <S%H1588><s%>

But of the <S%H4480>fruit<s%> <S%H6529><s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H559>said,<s%> Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall ye <S%H5060>touch<s%> it, <S%H6435>lest<s%> ye <S%H4191>die.<s%>
And the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> surely <S%H4191>die:<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> doth <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> ye <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>thereof,<s%> then your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be <S%H6491>opened,<s%> and ye shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H3045>knowing<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

And when the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%> was <S%H2896>good<s%> for <S%H3978>food,<s%> and <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> was <S%H8378>pleasant<s%> to the <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and a <S%H6086>tree<s%> to be <S%H2530>desired<s%> to make one <S%H7919>wise,<s%> she <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H4480>fruit<s%> <S%H6529><s%> thereof, and did <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> unto her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> her; and he did <S%H398>eat.<s%>

And the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of them <S%H8147>both<s%> were <S%H6491>opened,<s%> and they <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were <S%H5903>naked;<s%> and they <S%H8609>sewed<s%> <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H5929>leaves<s%> together, and <S%H6213>made<s%> themselves <S%H2290>aprons.<s%>

And they <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> in the <S%H7307>cool<s%> of the <S%H3117>day:<s%> and <S%H121>Adam<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> hid <S%H2244>themselves<s%> from the <S%H4480>presence<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8432>amongst<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H121>Adam,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H335>Where<s%> art thou?

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H6963>voice<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden,<s%> and I was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> was <S%H5903>naked;<s%> and I hid <S%H2244>myself.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> thee <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> wast <S%H5903>naked?<s%> Hast thou <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> <S%H4480><s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee that thou shouldest <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H398>eat?<s%>

And the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> to be <S%H5973>with<s%> me, <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> me <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and I did <S%H398>eat.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> that thou hast <S%H6213>done?<s%> And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H5377>beguiled<s%> me, and I did <S%H398>eat.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H779>cursed<s%> above <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and above <S%H4480>every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field;<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H1512>belly<s%> shalt thou <S%H1980>go,<s%> and <S%H6083>dust<s%> shalt thou <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy life: <S%H2416><s%>

And I will <S%H7896>put<s%> <S%H342>enmity<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> thee and the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> and her <S%H2233>seed;<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> shall <S%H7779>bruise<s%> thy <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H7779>bruise<s%> his <S%H6119>heel.<s%>

Unto <S%H413><s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H7235>greatly<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thy <S%H6093>sorrow<s%> and thy <S%H2032>conception;<s%> in <S%H6089>sorrow<s%> thou shalt bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H1121>children;<s%> and thy <S%H8669>desire<s%> shall be <S%H413>to<s%> thy <S%H376>husband,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H4910>rule<s%> over thee.

And unto <S%H121>Adam<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> thou hast <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thy <S%H802>wife,<s%> and hast <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it: <S%H779>cursed<s%> is the <S%H127>ground<s%> for thy <S%H5668>sake;<s%> in <S%H6093>sorrow<s%> shalt thou <S%H398>eat<s%> of it <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life;<s%>
Thorns <S%H6975><s%> also and <S%H1863>thistles<s%> shall it bring <S%H6779>forth<s%> to thee; and thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field;<s%>

In the <S%H2188>sweat<s%> of thy <S%H639>face<s%> shalt thou <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> thou <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H127>ground;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> it wast thou <S%H3947>taken:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art, and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> shalt thou <S%H7725>return.<s%>

And <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H802>wife's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H2332>Eve;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2416>living.<s%>
Unto <S%H121>Adam<s%> also and to his <S%H802>wife<s%> did the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3801>coats<s%> of <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> them.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H1961>become<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> us, to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil:<s%> and <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of the <S%H4480>tree<s%> <S%H6086><s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> and <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H2425>live<s%> forever: <S%H5769><s%>

Therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> sent him <S%H7971>forth<s%> from the <S%H4480>garden<s%> <S%H1588><s%> of <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> to <S%H5647>till<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> from <S%H4480>whence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H834><s%> he was <S%H3947>taken.<s%>

So he drove <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H120>man;<s%> and he <S%H7931>placed<s%> at the <S%H4480>east<s%> <S%H6924><s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3742>Cherubims,<s%> and a <S%H3858>flaming<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> which turned every <S%H2015>way,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%>
